WorkItem.Description:
I'll be just talking about issues that I've noticed while working with RAWR 3.0. I will not get into subjects such as "Filters are not showing," "I cannot edit item gemming," or "Loading from Armory is not working." These are things I understand need work on and you guys have already plans for. I will describe a few issues I've noticed, mostly cosmetic.
 
1) This is something that is not directly under your control but could be an issue when you guys implement RAWR3. Currently, Silverlight 3 Developer does not support IE8. I installed IE8 a week or so ago, and earlier installed today Silverlight 3. However, Silverlight 3 could not be registered with IE8. It worked fine with Firefox and Crome though. Silverlight 2 works fine with IE8 but not 3 (since I had 2 installed already).
 
2) Scrolling not implemented - If I hover over say the listing of the items, I cannot use my mouse scroll button to scroll threw the listing
 
3) Unable to view the results at the bottom. I know in the stand-alone, you have say the DPS, TPS, Mitigation, Survivability, HPS, etc at the bottom. So far it doesn't look like there is a way to do that unless you add a Javascript function to post in the window info bar (the section that say if you hover over a link, it says what the address of the bar is at the bottom).

Comments.Message:
1) Make sure you're installing the Silverlight 3 itself, not the Silverlight 3 Toolkit; it does fully support IE8.
2) Good point, will try to get that done.
3) Aye, thinking about the best way to do that; perhaps javascript, perhaps an extra bar in the bottom, or perhaps in the menu bar.
As for filters not showing. There is no default ItemFilter.xml placed on the server at the moment. So filters are working, they just start empty.
